Detailed Description

The FieldDefinition class encapsulate field schema definition.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Parameters

type_pField value type

  • DB_NOT_NULL,

Member Function Documentation

◆ initialize()

db_result_t storage::data::FieldDefinition::initialize ( db_cursor_t  cursor,
db_fieldno_t  fieldno__ 
)
inline

Initializes Field definition for a cursor's field.

Parameters
cursorCursor handle.
fieldno__Field number.
Returns
  • DB_OK when successful.

  • DB_FAIL on failure.

    On failure, one of the following error codes is set:

    • DB_EINVAL Cursor handle is invalid.
    • DB_ERANGE Field index is not valid

◆ valid()

bool storage::data::FieldDefinition::valid ( ) const
inline

Checks to see if field is valid.

Returns
  • true if the fieldtype is valid
  • false if the field type is not valid
